00052 namespace uStreamLib {
00053 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)
00054 
00055         typedef unsigned __int64 uint64;
00056         typedef __int64 int64;
00057 
00058 #else
00059 
00060         typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
00061         typedef signed long long int int64;
00062 
00063 #endif
00064 
00065         typedef unsigned int uint32;
00066         typedef int int32;
00067 
00068         typedef unsigned short uint16;
00069         typedef short int16;
00070 
00071         typedef unsigned char uint8;
00072         typedef signed char int8;
00073 }
00074 
00075 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)
00076 
00077 /*
00078  * Disables VisualC++ warning on Exception and
00079  * performance in bool->integer conversion
00080  */
00081 # pragma warning ( disable : 4290 )
00082 # pragma warning ( disable : 4800 )
00083 
00084 /*
00085  * Define specific and useful functions.
00086  */
00087 # define snprintf  _snprintf
00088 # define vsnprintf _vsnprintf

00132 /*
00133  * Useful macros
00134  */
00135 #if !defined(_WIN32) && !defined(WIN32)
00136 # if defined(US_BIG_ENDIAN)
00137 #  define MAKEFOURCC( ch0, ch1, ch2, ch3 ) ((uint32)(uint8)(ch3)|((uint32)(uint8)(ch2)<<8)|((uint32)(uint8)(ch1)<<16)|((uint32)(uint8)(ch0)<<24))
00138 # else
00139 #  define MAKEFOURCC( ch0, ch1, ch2, ch3 ) ((uint32)(uint8)(ch0)|((uint32)(uint8)(ch1)<<8)|((uint32)(uint8)(ch2)<<16)|((uint32)(uint8)(ch3)<<24))
00140 # endif
00141 #endif

00145  */

00148 # define UOSUTIL_DERR(fmt) fprintf fmt

00154 /*
00155  * Macros for safe deleting objects and arrays.
00156  */
00157 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE
00158 #define SAFE_DELETE(p)       { if(p) { delete (p);     (p)=NULL; } }
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
00162 #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(p) { if(p) { delete[] (p);   (p)=NULL; } }
00163 #endif
